List of previous finishing positions for Tidy Tullamore

2011 1st place in Large estate
2012 1st place in Large estate
2013 Overall Winners
2014 2nd place in Large estates
2015 Overall Winners
2016 Overall Winners
2017 Excellence Award
title: Tidy Tullamore

contents:
Whitehall And Daingean Road Residents Association is a local community group set up for the residents of Whitehall and Daingean Road in Tullamore.
The association has been in existence for over 30 years. It plays an important role in looking after the interests of residents. We arrange for the regular maintenance of the Whitehall estate while representing residents on any local issues that may impact the community.
Location Map
title: About Us
